prompt: Photorealistic image of a seasoned antique appraiser, mid-50s, wearing tweed and spectacles, meticulously examining an ornate silver teapot with a jeweler's loupe. The appraiser is seated at a large mahogany desk cluttered with reference books, magnifying lamps, and other antiques partially visible in the soft background blur. The composition uses the rule of thirds, placing the appraiser slightly off-center to the left, with the teapot as the focal point under focused, warm task lighting. Natural light streams from a window on the right, illuminating dust motes. Style: Cinematic realism, shallow depth of field, professional setting. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-appraisal-system-image-1.png

prompt: A wide, detailed flat lay composition showcasing essential antique appraisal tools arranged neatly on a dark, textured wooden surface. Includes a brass loupe, digital calipers, a small weighing scale, white cotton gloves, a measuring tape, and an open antique reference guide with detailed illustrations. The arrangement flows diagonally across the 16:9 frame, creating leading lines. Lighting is soft, directional daylight coming from the top left, casting gentle shadows and highlighting the textures of metal, wood, and paper. Style: High-detail photorealism, clean, organized aesthetic. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-appraisal-system-image-2.png

prompt: Extreme close-up, macro photography style, focusing on the intricate hand-painted details of an 18th-century porcelain figurine held carefully by gloved hands. The background shows a softly blurred antique appraisal setting – perhaps the edge of a desk, a reference book, and a magnifying lamp out of focus. The lighting is bright but diffused, highlighting the delicate colors, crazing on the glaze, and fine craftsmanship of the figurine, which dominates the center-right of the 16:9 frame. Style: Ultra-photorealistic, focus stacking effect, emphasizing texture and detail. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-appraisal-system-image-3.png

prompt: Modern antique appraisal scene: An over-the-shoulder shot of a person using a tablet displaying a specialized appraisal software interface with high-resolution images of a vintage ceramic vase. Next to the tablet on a clean, modern desk sits the actual vase, allowing for comparison. The background is a bright, contemporary office or home study. The lighting is clean and even, with a slight glow emanating from the tablet screen, reflecting subtly on the user's face. Composition focuses on the interaction between the physical object and its digital representation within the 16:9 frame. Style: Clean photorealism, tech-focused, professional. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-appraisal-system-image-4.png

prompt: A sophisticated close-up shot focusing on the final page of a formal antique appraisal document resting on a polished wooden desk. The document features official letterhead, detailed descriptions, a valuation figure, and an embossed seal or signature. A classic fountain pen lies diagonally across the document. In the upper background, softly blurred, sits the appraised item – perhaps a small antique clock or jewelry box – adding context. The lighting is warm and professional, like a desk lamp illuminating the paper's texture and the pen's details. The composition fills the 16:9 frame with the document as the primary subject. Style: Crisp photorealism, shallow depth of field, emphasis on authenticity and formality. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: antique-appraisal-system-image-5.png
